H0.text: What was the former name of the British Green Party. People's Party

H1.text: What was the former name of the British Green Party. Green Alliance

H2.text: What was the former name of the British Green Party. Environmental Party

H3.text: What was the former name of the British Green Party. Ecology Party

A4.text: Prior to 1985, it was called the Ecology Party; before that, it was also named PEOPLE.
